Requirement description: A procedure has an output
A sampling has a result
An actuation has a result
A sample is a type of feature of interest and result
Deployment is associated to a property
What is a sensor?
What is an actuator?
What is a procedure?
What is a deployment?
Platform has a deployment
A platform is deployed by some system
What is a system?
A sampling is linked to at least one sample
A sensor observes only observable properties
An observable property is a type of property
An observable property is observed by only sensors
An observation is related only to one feature of interest
The observation is originated by  exactly one stimulus
An observation has only  results
A sensor is a type of system
What is feature of interest?
A system implements a procedure
A system can have subsystems
A procedure has an input
What is a sensor?
Sensor detects an stimulus
What is a stimulus?
An observation is originated by a stimulus
What is a property?
The stimulus is proxy for a property
An actuator mades only actuations
A procedure is implemented by a system
A deplopyment is deployed in a platform
A sampling has one feature of interest
A variable can have metadata
A simple type variable is a variable that only consists of variables of simple XML types like xsd:integer; string; etc.; potentially including restrictions
A command has as output one or more operation outputs
A command has as input one or more operation inputs
A command represents an action that can be performed to support a functionality
An operation has a target URI
An operation has a method
A simple type variable contains the name of the attribute of the resource that is referenced with the target URI and that stores the value of the simple type variables
An operation may produce data into operation outputs (transient entities that are deleted when the operation finishes)
An operation may produce output data into output data points (persistent entities)
An operation may receive data from operation inputs (transient entities that are deleted when the operation finishes)
An operation may receive input data from input data points (persistent entities)
A simple type variable has exactly one datatype
A simple type variable has a data restriction
A simple type variable is a variable that only consists of variables of simple XML types like xsd:integer; string; etc.; potentially including restrictions
An operation is the -machine interpretable- exposure of a -human understandable- command to a network
An operation is the means of a service to communicate in a procedure-type manner over the network (i.e. transmit data to/from other devices)
A measuring functionality represents a functionality that has no impacts on the real world; but only gathers data
A controlling functionality represents a functionality that has impacts on the real world; but does not gather data
A functionality has commands that allow human users to influence/observe such functionality
A functionality represents the functionality necessary to accomplish the task for which a device is designed
A service has an output data point
A service has an input data point
A service has an operation
A service can be composed of independent (sub-)services
A variable has a URI of a resource through which the instantiation of the value of the variable can be manipulated
A variable has a CRUD method through which the instantiation of the variable value can be manipulated
A variable may have a value (useful for values that are relatively static)
A variable can be structured using other variables
An operation output describes an output of an operation and also describes the output of a command
An input data point is a variable of a service that is accessed by a RESTful device in its environment and that the device reads out autonomously (e.g. at periodic times)
An aspect could be a (physical or non-physical) entity or it could be a quality
An operation input describes an input of an operation and also describes the input of a command
A device performs one or more functionalities in order to accomplish a particular task
A device may be a physical or non-physical entity
A device is a thing that is able to interact electronically with its environment via a network
Metadata contain data (like units; precision-ranges) about a variable or about an aspect
An aspect can have metadata
An interworked device is part of an area network
A thing can have relations to other things
A thing may have properties
A thing is an entity that can be identified in the oneM2M System.
An area network follows a profile
An area network follows a communication protocol
An area network follows an standard that defines its physical properties
An area network is a network that provides data transport services between an interworked device and the oneM2M System
A service is an electronic representation of a functionality in a network

An interworked device is a device that does not support oneM2M interfaces and can only be accessed from the oneM2M System by communicating with a proxied (virtual) device that has been created by an interworking proxy entity
A device can be composed of several (sub-)devices
A device has one or more services that expose in the network its functionalities
An output data point is a variable of a service that is set by a RESTful device in its environment and that the device updates autonomously (e.g. at periodic times))
A variable describes a real-world aspect
A service can expose one or more functionalities
A variable describes an entity that stores some data (e.g. integers; text; etc.; or structured data) that can change over time
A device can be used for  the purpose of sensing
Water or gas are examples of commodities
A device can be used for  the purpose of offering a commodity
The devices can belong to several categories
Examples of functions are the  the actuating; sensing; metering or event functions
A function represents the functionality necessary to accomplish the task for which a device is designed
An energy meter is a device that has category Meter
An energy meter is a device that consists of a meter
The EnergyRelated category can be specialized into: Load; Generator and Storage
The FunctionRelated category can be specialized into: Actuator; Applicance; HVAC; Lighting; Meter; MicroRenewable; Multimedia; Network; Sensor
The devices can be classified into categories: FunctionRelated; EneryRelated and BuildingRelated
A device can optionally  have a description
A device shall have a model property
A device shall have a model property
Examples of devices are a light switch; a temperature sensor; an energy meter; a washing machine
A device performs one or more functions
What is a device?
The commands can be: on; off; open; toggle; close; startm pause; step up; step down; set level; get and notify
A device can be found in a correponding state
An energy meter is a device that has category Meter
A meter performs a metering function
A meter is a functionRelated device
A dimmer lamp performs an actuating level control
A dimmer lamp performs an actuating level control
A dimmer lamp is a device that has category Lighting and Actuator
A door switch is used for the purpose of controlling doors
A door switch  performs the open/close function
A door switch is a device that consists of a switch
A switch is a device that has category Actuator
A command can act upon a state  to represent that the consequence of a command can be a change of state of the device
A smoke sensor  is used for the purpose of sensing smoke
A smoke sensor performs a sensing and event function
A smoke sensor is a device that consists of a sensor
A smoke sensor is a device that has category Sensor
A washing machine performs an actuating start/pause function
A washing machine accomplishes the task of washing
A washing machine is a device that has category Appliance  and Load
A temperature senso performs the sensing function and is used for the purpose of sensing temperature
A temperature sensor consists of a sensor
A temperature sensor is a device that has category sensor
An actuating function can be specialized into on/off; open/close; start/stop or level control functions
A function can belong to a function category
A function shall have at least one command associated to it
A sensor performs a sensing function
A device may consists of other devices
A device may consists of other devices
Examples of properties are temperature; energy or smoke
A device can be used for notifying  a property
A device can be used for measuring a property
